thread.title: GIVEAWAY! 2000 closed beta keys for PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds | VG247
thread.title_full: GIVEAWAY! 2000 closed beta keys for PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds | VG247

title: GIVEAWAY! 2000 closed beta keys for PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds | VG247
text:
GIVEAWAY! 2000 closed beta keys for PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds Friday, 24 February 2017 11:16 GMT By Staff Share on: 
Get in on the closed beta for PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds on Steam. 
We have 2,000 closed beta keys to give away for PlayUnknown’s Battlegrounds, a new battle royal multiplayer shooter for PC. 
The game pits 64 players against one another, forcing them to scavenge for weapons and survive in a gradually shrinking arena. 
You can check the system requirements and beta times right here . It all kicks off February 24 at 4pm GMT and runs for four weekends. 
Just enter your details in the widget below and the first 2,000 will get a key which they can redeem via Steam. Good luck! Share on: Latest
